md:
giải nghĩa từ "columns" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

**Definition:** Columns are vertical structures that support the weight of a building or other structure.

**Vietnamese translation:** Cột (danh từ)

**Part of speech:** Noun

**Example sentence:** The ancient temple had four columns that supported the heavy roof.

**Related words:**

* Pillar (danh từ): a vertical structure that supports a building or other structure
* Post (danh từ): a vertical structure that supports a building or other structure
* Beam (danh từ): a horizontal structure that supports a building or other structure

**Antonyms:**

* Beam (danh từ): a horizontal structure that supports a building or other structure (opposite of vertical)
* Wall (danh từ): a vertical structure that encloses a building or other structure (not a support structure)

Note: While "columns" and "pillars" are often used interchangeably, "pillars" tend to be more ornate and decorative, whereas "columns" are more functional and structural.

Definition: Columns are vertical structures that support the weight of a building or other structure.

Vietnamese translation: Cột (danh từ)

Part of speech: Noun

Example sentence: The ancient temple had four columns that supported the heavy roof.

Related words:

  • Pillar (danh từ): a vertical structure that supports a building or other structure
  • Post (danh từ): a vertical structure that supports a building or other structure
  • Beam (danh từ): a horizontal structure that supports a building or other structure

Antonyms:

  • Beam (danh từ): a horizontal structure that supports a building or other structure (opposite of vertical)
  • Wall (danh từ): a vertical structure that encloses a building or other structure (not a support structure)

Note: While "columns" and "pillars" are often used interchangeably, "pillars" tend to be more ornate and decorative, whereas "columns" are more functional and structural.
